summary.para: Sets the filter on the contents of the current view.

param.name: bstrFilterText
param.para: The BSTR that names the filter view for the current folder.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the settings for the current folder.

param.name: pdwFlags
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the current setting flags. For a list of possible values, see .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the column used for grouping the folder view.

param.name: pbstrGroupBy
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the column name.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the icon size setting for the current folder.

param.name: piIconSize
param.para: When this method returns, contains a pointer to the icon size value.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the names of the columns used to sort the current folder.

param.name: pbstrSortColumns
param.para: A BSTR that contains the column names.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

param.name: dwFlags
param.para: Flags that determine the folder settings. For a list of possible values, see .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the column used in grouping the folder view.

param.name: bstrGroupBy
param.para: A BSTR that contains the column name.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the icon size setting for the current folder.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Sets the names of the columns to be sorted.

param.name: bstrSortColumns
param.para: The BSTR that contains the names of the columns to be sorted for the current folder.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that modify the current folder view.

remarks.para: This interface also provides the methods of the and interfaces, from which it inherits.
